attributes.additional_details:
This petition is to address the current problems with the A120 between Colchester and Harwich International Port.
The road is currently single carriageway and is used by many HGVs, LGVs and trade for export making it dangerous and slow.
There are frequent collisions on the road, many turning into fatalities.
Calling for this section of the A120 to be dual carriageway.
